All Classes

Class Description
ActionSelectChar
Implements an action that selects a specific character
ActionSelectTool
Implements an action that selects a specific tool
AsciiBrush
Instances of AsciiBrush implement a strategy for drawing lines into an AsciiRaster surface.
AsciiFont
This class holds information about a loaded font, that is the glyph collection and the width and height in pixels of glyphs.
AsciiPainter
An instance of AsciiPainter exposes methods to draw graphics into an AsciiRaster instance, called the surface.
AsciiPanel
It implements a swing panel that displays an ascii art image.
AsciiPanelModel
This class models the state of an AsciiPanel instance, that is provides a raster and a font and notifies changes to observers.
AsciiRaster
This class displays a rectangular grid of characters ascii.
AsciiRasterReader
Create an instance of AsciiRaster by loading data from a file.
AsciiRasterWriter
Write data from an instance of AsciiRaster into a file.
CharacterBrush
This implementation of the AsciiBrush interface draws a line by writing a specific character at each point of the line, with the active background and foreground color of the painter that is used to draw.
CharacterSelectorDialog
Displays the ASCII character grid and allows you to select one
DrawRectTool
Implements the MouseInputListener interface to provide the behavior of the rectangle draw tool.
EditorListener
Listener for actions performed in the main editor view.
EditorStateModel
This class models the state of the whole editor application.
EditorView
The main window of the application.
EraserBrush
This implementation of the AsciiBrush interface erases a line by replacing the character at each point of the line with a space, while preserving foreground and background colors.
EraseTool
Implements the MouseInputListener interface to provide the behavior of the erase tool.
FillRectTool
Implements the MouseInputListener interface to provide the behavior of the rectangle fill tool.
FillTool
Implements the MouseInputListener interface to provide the behavior of the fill tool.
ImageConverter
An helper class for converting pixel images to ASCII art
ImageEditor
Main controller of the editor application.
ImportDialog
A customized file chooser which allows you to import images and convert them into ascii-art specifying conversion parameters
LinearBrush
A useful abstract class that simplifies the implementation of many kind of brushes: specifically those that work by executing an operation for each point on the line.
NewImageDialog
A dialog window which allows you to reinitialize the ascii panel specifying the dimensions
PaintTool
Implements the MouseInputListener interface to provide the behavior of the paint tool.
PickTool
Implements the MouseInputListener interface to provide the behavior of the pick tool.
ToolType
An enum that defines available tools with their icon, label and implementation.
